data.actual_result: The navigation bar clips into the top bar
data.expected_result: The call should re-order itself earlier to avoid the clipping (make client smaller to see what i mean)
data.short_description: The navigation bar vanishes behind the top bar when in a video call on splitscreen (after switching back to the DM)
data.steps_to_repro: - get into a video call with your best friend - make sure both of you have your videos/screenshare on - make sure to show both feeds (doubleclick on your partner's video) and click on the enlarge button - resize discord until the videos are shown below one another - as you resize vertically (do horizontal first, then vertical resize), the bottom bar (hover to show "leave call etc") will vanish - ! This behaviour happens automatically when on ~ 15.6 and split screen, as it has the required window size - click away and back into the dm and observe
